vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.2
§ Bigvai = "in my bodies"
an exile who returned under Zerubbabel, perhaps the head of a family
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比革瓦伊 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "在我體內"
1) 跟著所羅巴伯一起從被擄歸回的家族領袖之一
2) 尼希米時代的一名領袖 #尼 10:16|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
比革瓦伊 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "在我体内"
1) 跟着所罗巴伯一起从被掳归回的家族领袖之一
2) 尼希米时代的一名领袖 #尼 10:16|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.14
§ Bigvai = "in my bodies"
an exile who returned under Zerubbabel, perhaps the head of a family

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.16
§ Bigvai = "in my bodies"
an exile who returned under Zerubbabel, perhaps the head of a family
